name: Pay your Passage
description:
BUG NOTICE: The base passage for sheep is $11 higher than it should be for quantities of sheep 18 or greater. The "PassageCalculationInstructions" also has a typo and should read "9th - 17th sheep" instead of "8th - 17th sheep". The file and game will be patched after the jam lock ends to fix both the game and file.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I was unfortunately unable to get the text input box working on the planned web version of the game.  The game has also not been tested on Mac or Linux, but versions are available in the hope that as many interested persons can experience the game as possible. I hope to find a way to fix and update the browser version after the jam has concluded.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: Be sure to read the file "PassageCalculationInstructions" included in the download to get the most out of your experience with the game.

Calculate how much your passage costs for you and your grain, wine, and sheep.

Enter the value you think is correct into the text box and click the button to get a new passage to calculate.

A short experience with some replay value created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #5.
